p.k: Market / Pirates / Farm / Circus / Train / Seaside Mel, Shaun and Jake the dog explore the market, and create their own pretend fruit and veg stall! When Shaun munches into an apple, the rhythm is set for his Shake… / Mel, Shaun and Jake are all out at sea! / Mel & Shaun make their own play farm and play a Guess the Animal game! / Roll up! It’s time for clowning around as the gang watch some children visit a circus workshop. Shaun’s juggling leads him to today’s rhythm and Mel joins in for a circus Shake... / Choo! Choo! All aboard! Mel, Shaun and Jake go on a make-believe train journey after watching some children visit a steam railway. / Mel, Shaun and Jake can’t get to the seaside, like the children they see in today’s show, so with a few bits and pieces and a lot of imagination, they make their own.
